feed.title: Code BEAM Mexico
feed.subtitle: The major Elixir and Erlang event in MÃ©xico. The Elixir and Erlang community celebrates ten years of Elixir in Mexico City. Meet people and companies using and developing high performance, fault-tolerant and resilient applications that scale to billions of users in production in areas like Fintech, eCommerce, IoT, Gaming, Blockchain, Security, Machine Learning and more.
